Training timer online

  • Timer

    Timer with pie chart and sound accompaniment

  • Dark theme

  • Creation and editing of training sessions

This project was created because I did not find what I needed on the market, at that time it was so. There are custom intervals for each exercise and for each rest period. The timer has a sound accompaniment at the end of the exercise or rest period.
